column5: Read the story with picture from the link below.  http://sports.espn.go.com/outdoors/fishing...record_turns-50
WOW, is about all that can be said. My biggest was close to 7 and this dwarfs it. IMO, smallmouth are the "grouper" of freshwater and just about one of the funnest fish to catch.  Ryan
I only live about 2 hours away from Dale Hallow but have yet to fish it. I hear lots of good things and they also have a 21 inch slot on smallies (i think) which helps.
